LanguageData.JRWPteranodonReconstruct.label: Pteranodon
LanguageData.JRWPteranodonReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #0961-1876 [PTERANODON LONGICEPS] CODENAME: TOOTHLESS-WING >482
An extremely famous pterosaur. One of the largest known flying reptiles, this creature boasts an impressive crest and a powerful grip, able to lift a full grown man with ease.
